ai-ja347:1.3_0: You’re guarded and protected by me,
ai-ja347:1.4_0: or else because I killed myself?”
ai-ja347:2.4_0: that’s why I’m unable to keep up with you.”
ai-ja347:3.2_0: Sakka, lord of gods, is happy and healthy.
ai-ja347:3.3_0: Gone for sensual pleasures, one whose sense of conscience,
ai-ja347:5.1_0: on the seventh day they went to sleep.
